name: ResetPasswordWithTemp
description:
Reset a user's password to a temporary one and expire it.

This tool expires a user's password and resets it to a temporary password, transitioning the user's status to `PASSWORD_EXPIRED`. It requires the user to change their password upon next sign-in. Optionally, it can revoke the user's current sessions. This is especially useful in scenarios needing immediate password changes for security reasons.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: An ID, login, or unambiguous shortname of an existing Okta user for whom the password will be reset.

value_schema.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

parameters.name: revoke_user_sessions
parameters.description: Set to true to revoke the user's existing sessions, forcing re-authentication.

value_schema.description: Revokes the user's existing sessions if `true`

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: revokeSessions
parameters.description: Revokes the user's existing sessions if `true`

value_schema.description: Revokes the user's existing sessions if `true`

parameters.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

value_schema.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user
